text: Gava di deryaye da nexwesiyek bi we digire, ji pestire (Yezdan) ewan tisten ku hun ji wan lavaya dikin, wunda dibin (ji bira we dicin, loma ji pestire wi tu kes nikare we fereste bike). Dema ku Yezdan we ji deryaye li bal resayiye derdixe, hun disa ji we perestiya xuri ru difetilinin. Bi rasti meriv, pir nankor in
